item.title: Meet The Applause Testing Community
item.description: Get to know the world's largest and most diverse software testing community and how Applause helps extend your testing capabilities, whenever and wherever you need.

metaGlobalVars.seoTitle: About the Applause Testing Community
metaGlobalVars.seoDescription: Learn more about the capabilities of Applause's software testing community and how our crowdtesting model complements your existing QA team.

item.title: Thinking about a career with Applause?

fields.text:
We've got some advice that might help. We're all about openness, honesty and learning, so go ahead, put yourself out there. We do it everyday.

Find out why Applause is a great place to work, see our culture, and if it looks like we’re a match, check out our current global job listings.

item.title: We may be biased, but you just made the best choice of your career.

fields.text: Joining a new team is exciting and stressful at once. We want you to feel at home, quickly. Applause team members offer simple and sage advice to new members of Applause Nation. And check out this page to see the great life you’re gonna have here.

metaGlobalVars.seoTitle: The State of Digital Quality 2022
metaGlobalVars.seoDescription: Do your digital experiences live up to customer expectations? See what customers really want and learn how to deliver experiences that keep them coming back.

fields.text: Your app works in the lab. But is it truly ready for your customers? Only Applause can tell. We deliver authentic, real-world feedback on the quality of your digital experiences. Through an enterprise-grade testing platform and a global community of digital experts, with curated testing teams matched to your precise needs. Delivering results with the speed, scale and flexibility you expect. So you'll know for sure the quality is there. And you can release with confidence. Watch our ​short ​overview video to learn more.

metaGlobalVars.seoTitle: We Are Applause
metaGlobalVars.seoDescription: Through an enterprise-grade testing platform and a global community of digital experts, with curated testing teams matched to your precise needs.

item.title: Best Practices for Better Conversational AI

fields.text: Investment in natural language processing (NLP) technologies is on the rise. Done right, NLP projects have the potential to excite customers and increase customer satisfaction and loyalty to your brand. Yet there are specific challenges to voice projects that many organizations don't see coming. The video below covers basic best practices for planning for and moving through successful NLP projects.

Download the full presentation from this session

Read our ebook - 4 Best Practices for Better Natural Language Assistants.

metaGlobalVars.seoTitle: Learn keys for launching AI conversational assistants
metaGlobalVars.seoDescription: Launching NLP assistants isn't easy. Learn key AI considerations like training your AI on quality data; testing across the full array of devices and more.

item.title: Ask the Expert: AQS
item.description: Ask the Expert Series: Applause Quality Score.

metaGlobalVars.seoTitle: Ask the Expert: AQS
metaGlobalVars.seoDescription: Ask the Expert Series: Applause Quality Score.

item.title: AQS Preview from Nadav Barkaee, Senior Product Manager

fields.text: Making a software release decision often comes down to a gut call. We want to change that. Product and development teams need a data point to quantify how their software is improving over time and when a build is ready for the real world. This is what our Applause Quality Score addresses — it’s a quantifiable metric that gives you a new tool to measure your software quality.

metaGlobalVars.seoTitle: AQS Preview from Nadav Barkaee, Senior Product Manager
metaGlobalVars.seoDescription: As the global leader in remote QA testing, we want to share our knowledge with you. Every month, we’ll have new development and testing advice for you.

item.title: Welcome from our CEO, Doron Reuveni

fields.text: As the global leader in remote QA testing, we want to share our knowledge with you. Every month, we’ll have new development and testing advice for you, as well as some updates on what’s going on here at Applause.

metaGlobalVars.seoTitle: Welcome from our CEO, Doron Reuveni
metaGlobalVars.seoDescription: As the global leader in remote QA testing, we want to share our knowledge with you. Every month, we’ll have new development and testing advice for you.

fields.text: Today, every company is digital and enterprise success hinges on the quality of digital experiences. In this video, Applause CEO Doron Reuveni explains how the Applause-Infosys partnership increases development velocity and test coverage for enterprises, and ultimately improves the quality of their customer experiences.

metaGlobalVars.seoTitle: Applause-Infosys Partnership
metaGlobalVars.seoDescription: Applause CEO Doron Reuveni explains how the Applause-Infosys partnership increases development velocity and test coverage for enterprises.

item.title: Product Preview from Kristin Simonini, VP of Product

fields.text: We’re excited to announce Integrated Functional Testing, our new offering that combines manual and automated testing into a comprehensive and holistic solution. Watch my video for more information on this first-of-its-kind offering!
